1.name: Back Stab
1.details: Yui’s basic attack behind the target critical strikes for an additional amount of the physical damage.

2.name: Flying Kunais
2.details: Yui launches 5 kunais in a cone-shaped direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) for each kunai hit.

3.name: Blade Spin
3.details: Yui spins around with her blades, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all nearby enemies and reducing their movement speed for a short duration.

4.name: Substitution Jutsu
4.details:
Yui replaces herself with a wooden dummy and appears behind a target enemy, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power).

All on-going projectiles will go to the dummy instead.

5.name: Smoke Screen
5.details:
Yui detonates a smoke bomb, becomes stealthed, gains increased movement speed and refreshes Backstabâ€™s cooldown.

Enemies hit by the smoke bomb will have reduced vision for a short duration.
